org.soulwing.prospecto.cdi

Class BeanManagerScope

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.soulwing.prospecto.cdi.BeanManagerScope
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Scope

    public class BeanManagerScope
extends Object
implements Scope
    A Scope that delegates to a CDI BeanManager.
    Author:
    Carl Harris
